statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT description, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT incident_id, severity FROM security_incidents ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND severity < 3 ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, description, severity FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE description LIKE '%security breach%';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Leak' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description AS description, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE log_date > '2021-01-01' AND log_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT security_incidents.incident_id, security_logs.log_description FROM security_incidents JOIN security_logs ON security_incidents.incident_id = security_logs.incident_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type ORDER BY incident_type DESC;
SELECT MAX(log_date) AS latest_log_date, MIN(log_date) AS earliest_log_date FROM security_logs;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM BreachDetails ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, log_date, log_description FROM IncidentLogs WHERE log_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, description, reported_by FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM BreachDetails bd JOIN SecurityIncidents si ON bd.incident_id = si.incident_id WHERE si.reported_by = 'IT Department';
SELECT * FROM IncidentLogs WHERE log_date > '2021-09-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, severity_level FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM breach_logs WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM breach_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT note_id, note_text FROM investigation_notes WHERE investigator_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_description, severity_level FROM security_incidents WHERE severity_level = 'High' AND affected_system = 'Finance' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT log_date, log_details, breach_type FROM breach_logs WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak' ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM investigation_notes WHERE investigator_name LIKE '%John%' AND note_text LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY note_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR email = 'admin@example.com';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, breach_date FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT log_id, incident_id, log_date, details FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT description FROM security_breaches JOIN breach_logs ON security_breaches.breach_id = breach_logs.breach_id
